title: Client shrunk
body:
I am on the new update and I was accidentaly clicking something on my mac os sierra and my client shrunk for almost 40%
I tried the cmd /ctrl + to make it bigger but it doesn't work. everything else on screen is normal size, just having problems with LOL

help please :( my screen is already only 13 inch

replies.body: You can change the window size under the client settings in the upper right corner! Bump that up a bit and you should be g2g ^_^

In the top right corner of the client, next to the X, Options > General > Window Size

Is it just the LoL client that shrunk, or do things in general seem smaller? If more than just the LoL client seems smaller, you might have changed your screen resolution.
